name: Easy Sautéed Garlic Butter Asparagus (Low-Carb Side Dish)
description: This Buttered Garlic Asparagus recipe is a delightful addition to any meal, perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet. It's part of our Healthy Recipes collection, designed to enhance your meals with a touch of green and a burst of flavor while keeping health in mind.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the asparagus by washing them and trimming off the tough ends.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil, add salt, then blanch the asparagus for 2-3 minutes until tender but still crisp. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the sliced garlic and sauté for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched asparagus to the pan. Sprinkle with salt to taste, and toss to coat evenly with the garlic butter. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
